metadata.title: CVE-2021-25291 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.1.1. In TiffDecode.c, there isan out-of-bounds read in TiffreadRGBATile via invalid tile boundaries.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25291` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 8.1.2-1
python3-pil.imagetk - 8.1.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.1.2-1').
